title: I am looking for to buy pixel 4A, I need to know the service centre location in Coimbatore,TN,India
content: Need to know the service centre location. Just in case if my phone breaks or malfunctions,need to know whether service centre is so that I will be able to get repaired or replaced . If there is no Service centre in Coimbatore won't be getting for pixel phone. I couldn't able to find any of the authorised Service centre of Google in  Coimbatore. Kindly provide me with the information
